stim: There isn't too much here, is there?
convo: "It can be dangerous out there. I'm glad I was assigned to the supply end of this work."

stim: The bodega cat rubs your leg as you browse.
convo: "I'm sorry I have to charge so much for sandwiches...it's this damn bank mortgage."

stim: It smells of sandalwood and frankincense while you browse.
convo: The clerk is a bored-looking transfeminine person wearing a sword pendant. "Whatever. Ask me again when you really need my help, okay?"
